itunes:title: Okazuya (with Jodi Endo Chai)
title: Okazuya (with Jodi Endo Chai)
description:
Jodi Endo Chai, co-author of the 2000 okazuya guide "Oh, 'Cause You Hungry!" and Executive Officer of the State of Hawaii Public Utilities Commission, joins Ron to reminisce about the classic delicatessens and explains the struggles these family businesses face in trying to survive.

Support the show

content:encoded:
